https://tmrev.io/movie/277015-Bharat Bhagya Vidhata 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Chaitanya Suryavanshi (Vikram Aditya) is a young, carefree college student in love with classmate Sapna (Rinku Ghosh). His father, Mahendra (Shatrughan Sinha), is a powerful politician, while mother Rukmini (Jaya Pradha) is a schoolteacher. When a dreaded terrorist (Tom Alter) is captured in a daredevil military operation and another terrorist (Chandrachur Singh) plans a deadly counter-operation, the family becomes an unwilling participant. Bharat Bhagya Vidhata
